entry.title: It's better with you.
entry.summary:
Author: three_milks

Summary: "My life is better since I met you," Tim says suddenly. "My parents are never home, I was lonely... Then I met you and everything was better."Jason smiles and moves closer. He feels the same way, he was very overwhelmed by suddenly entering Gotham's high society and she was there to brighten his world."And it's going to keep getting better," Jason promises and kisses her temple."Everything is better with you. You're my hero." Tim says it dramatically, but Jason senses the sincerity.

entry.title: Shadow Take Flight
entry.summary:
Author: ChaoGirlBlunder

Summary: Fatima Drake’s life was never her own. From the moment she took her first breath, she was bound to serve Ra’s al Ghul and his League of Shadows. Born to wealthy Gotham elites who hid their allegiance to the League behind polished façades, Fatima was raised in a world of dualities—lavish privilege interwoven with brutal training. Her mind and body were forged into the perfect weapon, a prodigy molded to fulfill the League’s every demand.But Fatima’s sharp mind was not so easily caged. Her knack for observation and solving mysteries led her to uncover Batman’s greatest secret: the man behind the mask. She kept the revelation to herself, knowing it was both her most dangerous weapon and her greatest liability.When the League assigns her a new mission—to befriend and spy on Bruce Wayne’s new ward, Jason Todd—Fatima finds her loyalties tested as never before. With her heart pulling her one way and her destiny pulling her another, she must decide who she truly wants to be.

entry.title: PEARLS are tears for you
entry.summary:
Author: JELLYlovALL

Summary: How did it come to this? he was supposed to be laying on the couch at the comfort of his home basking on the lazy Sunday afternoon light. So why is he here breaking the law, dressed in all black as if he was planning to steal a valuable and high guarded ancient artifact? How did it come to this?This is my first and official fanfic of these two, also English is not my first language so i would like to apologize in advance for anything wrong. <3

entry.title: Magic Gave Me Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Cy_kun

Summary: He opens his eyes, and stares up at the canopy of the four poster bed he's in. It takes a second, his vision is a bit blurry, but it clears up quick enough.Two seconds.Three seconds.Four seconds.Part of Jason keeps the count going, while the rest of him kind of just...seizes. Because he knows this canopy. He knows the the posts it's attached to. He—fuck—he knows the notch in the bottom left post he'd put in it when he'd stolen one of Bruce's batarangs when he was twelve and thrown it around like the stupid kid he'd been.This was Jason's room. Or, the one where Jason gets zapped with magic, wakes up in his teenage body, and decides to let the timeline know exactly how fucked it is. He also becomes the president of the Tim Drake Appreciation Club.

entry.title: El rojo de tus ojos
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_GM

Summary: La sociedad, el punto de donde desees verla, siempre será una mierda. Siempre habrá estatus y clases que van a dividir a la gente, solo los más fuertes y con más poder mandan. ¿Tienes algún camino para aspirar a más? Vives lo suficiente siendo un criado, o mueres queriendo justicia. Así es la vida, de eso trata, y jamás va a cambiar, ni aun siendo vampiro.
